mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.order_amount AS "orderAmount", a.product_id AS "productId", a.product_name AS "productName", a.order_status AS "orderStatus", a.order_type AS "orderType", a.member_id AS "memberId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lzr_order( order_id, order_time, order_amount, product_id, product_name, order_status, order_type, member_id, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{orderTime}, #{orderAmount}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderType}, #{memberId}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, )
mapper.update: UPDATE lzr_order SET order_id =#{orderId}, order_time =#{orderTime}, order_amount =#{orderAmount}, product_id =#{productId}, product_name =#{productName}, order_status =#{orderStatus}, order_type =#{orderType}, member_id =#{memberId}, update_date =#{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
